mapper.select: SELECT Machine_Name as machineName, Machine_Signal as machineSignal, Machine_Mode as machineMode, Machine_Status as machineStatus, Maintenance_Signal as maintenanceSignal, PartsCount_Target as partscountTarget, PartsCount_Result as partscountResult, ifnull(Override_Rapid,'0')as overrideRapid, ifnull(Override_Spindle,'0')as overrideSpindle, ifnull(Override_Feed,'0')as overrideFeed, Spindle_Mode as spindleMode FROM Monitoring_List WHERE Machine_Name=#{name}
